sunshine.title: Sunshine
sunshine.options.main.title: Main Settings
sunshine.options.main.freezeTime.tooltip: If Enabled, will freeze world time.
sunshine.options.main.timeTick.tooltip: If time is frozen, what time do you want it to be set to? (in ticks)
sunshine.options.shortcuts.title: Shortcuts Settings
sunshine.options.shortcuts.shortcut1.too: Will freeze the time and set it to this option when pressing on the shortcut #1.
sunshine.options.shortcuts.shortcut2.too: Will freeze the time and set it to this option when pressing on the shortcut #2.
sunshine.options.shortcuts.shortcut3.too: Will freeze the time and set it to this option when pressing on the shortcut #3.
